title: Mitosis. - 2nd ed.
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and William L. Claiborne
brief_description: Defines the cellular process of mitosis. Identifies and illustrates the role of the cell nucleus, DNA, chromosomes, chromatids and the centriole in mitosis. Demonstrates the phases of mitosis and explains what happens during each phase. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
